Detailed Description

Base class to create "revision control system" plugin. This plugin will create a derivated object when the project will be open, and destroy this object when the project is closed.

This object will be used along the project mode, to show to the user the status of a file, to update from repository, to commit to the repository, to add a file to the repository, or to remove a file from the repository.

Member Typedef Documentation

typedef QPair<QString,rcsOperation> RCS::FileOperation

Pair of file name and operation to do.

typedef QList<FileOperation> RCS::FilesOperation

List of FileOperation.

Member Enumeration Documentation

enum RCS::rcsLog

Information that can be returned in the log

Enumerator:
LogError  The message is an error.
LogNormal  The message has no attribute.
LogConflict  The message is about conflicted files.
LogLocallyModified  The message is about modified files on the disk.
LogRemotlyModified  The message is about modified files on the repository.
LogNotManaged  The message has an unknown type.
LogApplication  This is the application (XINX) who log the message.

enum RCS::rcsOperation

Operation that can be made on a file when commit is asked

Enumerator:
RemoveAndCommit  Remove the file and commit this change.
AddAndCommit  Add the file and commit it.
Commit  Commit the file.
Nothing  Do nothing.

enum RCS::rcsState

RCS state of a file on the disk

Enumerator:
Updated  The file is up to date, no operation to do.
LocallyModified  The file is modified on the disk but not in the repository.
LocallyAdded  The file is added to the repository.
LocallyRemoved  The file is removed from the repository.
NeedsCheckout  The file exists in the repository, but not in the disk.
NeedPatch  Not used.
UnresolvedConflict  The file has a conflict but not resolved.
FileHadConflictsOnMerge  The file has a resolved conflict.
Unknown  The state of the file is unknown, the file is not is the repository.

Member Function Documentation

virtual void RCS::abort (  )  [pure virtual, slot]

This function is called when an operation is in progress and the user want abort it. If the operation can't be aborted, the function do nothing.

virtual void RCS::add ( const QStringList &  path  )  [pure virtual]

Call the add command of the plugin and return immediatly.

The add function must be launch in a thread or a process and sent signal for log (log) or at the end of the thread (operationTerminated).

Parameters:
path List of path or file to be added.
See also:
abort(), remove(), commit(), updateToRevision(), update()

virtual void RCS::commit ( const FilesOperation &  path,
const QString &  message 
) [pure virtual]

Call the commit command of the plugin and return immediatly.

The commit function must be launch in a thread or a process and sent signal for log (log) or at the end of the thread (operationTerminated).

Parameters:
path List of file to be commited. Each file is associated with a operation : RCS::Commit, RCS::AddAndCommit, and RCS::RemoveAndCommit.
message Message used while commit.
See also:
abort(), add(), remove(), updateToRevision(), update()

const QString & RCS::getBasePath (  )  const

Return the base path of the revision control system class.

virtual struct_rcs_infos RCS::infos ( const QString &  path  )  [pure virtual]

Take a file name in argument and return informations about the filename in a struct_rcs_infos structure. The file name must be in the base path

See also:
getBasePath()

void RCS::log ( RCS::rcsLog  niveau,
const QString &  info 
) [signal]

Signal emited when a new message must be added to the log. The niveau is used to highlight the text in different way, depending on the gravity of the message.

Parameters:
niveau gravity of the message
info message to be added.
See also:
add(), remove(), commit(), updateToRevision(), update()

virtual FilesOperation RCS::operations ( const QStringList &  path  )  [pure virtual]

Return a list of operation for a path or a list of path (in case of multiple selections. In function of plugin and state of file, the operation can be RCS::RemoveAndCommit, RCS::AddAndCommit, and RCS::Commit. This list will be used in the commit dialog to show files to Commit.

void RCS::operationTerminated (  )  [signal]

Signal emited when an operation is terminated.

See also:
add(), remove(), commit(), updateToRevision(), update()

virtual void RCS::remove ( const QStringList &  path  )  [pure virtual]

Call the remove command of the plugin and return immediatly.

The remove function must be launch in a thread or a process and sent signal for log (log) or at the end of the thread (operationTerminated).

Parameters:
path List of path or file to be removed.
See also:
abort(), add(), commit(), updateToRevision(), update()

void RCS::stateChanged ( const QString &  fileName  )  [signal]

Signal emited when the state of a file is changed but the file don't change (because file is commited, or for another reason).

Parameters:
fileName the name of the file who changed.

virtual void RCS::update ( const QStringList &  path  )  [pure virtual]

Call the update command of the plugin and return immediatly.

The update function must be launch in a thread or a process and sent signal for log (log) or at the end of the thread (operationTerminated).

Parameters:
path List of path or file to be updated.
See also:
abort(), add(), remove(), commit(), updateToRevision()

virtual void RCS::updateToRevision ( const QString &  path,
const QString &  revision,
QString *  content = 0 
) [pure virtual]

Call the update command of the plugin for a file at a given revision and return immediatly.

The update function must be launch in a thread or a process and sent signal for log (log) or at the end of the thread (operationTerminated).

Parameters:
path Path of the file to retrieve.
revision Destination revision of the file.
content Where the content of the revision must be stored. If null, the revision must override the original file.
See also:
abort(), add(), remove(), commit(), update()
